metadata.title: CVE-2022-36354 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A heap out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in the RLA format parser ofOpenImageIO master-branch-9aeece7a and v2.3.19.0. More specifically, in theway run-length encoded byte spans are handled. A malformed RLA file canlead to an out-of-bounds read of heap metadata which can result insensitive information leak. An attacker can provide a malicious file totrigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: openimageio package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
